name: ethspeed
short_description:
A lightweight command line ethernet speed (bandwidth usage ) monitor. The project's code maintained at github
http://ajju4988.github.io/ethspeed/


Installation:

    $ sudo ./install.py

Uninstallation:

    $ sudo ./uninstall.py

Usage e.g:

    $ ethspeed eth0

download: 0.3340 KBps       upload: 0.0000 KBps

for multiple ports , gives the combined value

    $ ethspeed eth0 eth1

download: 70.3340 KBps       upload: 0.0000 KBps
summary: A lightweight command line ethernet speed monitor
